package.name: morse
package.shortDescription: Translate text into morse code using the highly precise Taptic Engine (iOS 13+)

descriptionlist.description:
Translate text into morse code using the highly precise Taptic Engine from terminal

Usage: morse -t "translate this text"

Compatible with iOS 13+ since it's using Apple's CoreHaptics Framework.

To support development: https://www.paypal.me/udevs
